question: Who has released the Department of Administrative Reforms and Grievances (DARPG)'s Grievance Study Analysis of 20 Ministries?
explanation: The Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) of the Ministry of Development of North Eastern Region (DoNER), MoS PMO, Personnel, Public Grievances & Pensions, Atomic Energy and Space, Dr Jitendra Singh released the Department of Administrative Reforms and Grievances (DARPG)'s Grievance Study Analysis of 20 Ministries.
